channel.title: Connection help
channel.description: okay my server is online, i used 3 differn't checkers. My brother is on the laptop and we are on differn't networks and im connected on my server, he downloaded my client and it was working for about 2 days but now it instantly says error connecting to server. What should he do? he has internet connection, he isn't banned or ip banned. Idk what else there is.

item.title: Connection help
item.dc:creator: @Infernal_Pure Infernal Pure
item.description:
@Infernal_Pure wrote:

You’re IPv4 address could of changed, which would cause your Port-Forwarding to go all whack, which would change your no-ip ( if using ) etc etc… So.

Go to you’re start, and click search. Search ‘Cmd’

Once open, type in Ipconfig.

It will show your IPv4 address. Once done, go check your Port-Forwarding. Make sure they match, otherwise, it won’t work.

Hope I helped (:

Read full topic
